RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OFFICIAL BUSINESS bore in start, regrouped to chase leader, angled out ridden out. FROOME (IRE) inside postion to the stretch angled out for run, held place spot. WRITEITONTHEICE bothered from gate lagged back to the turn, split horses for show. KICK ROCKS KID outside trip while never a threat. IKE AND JACK bothered from the gate, rushed up to lead to stretch, faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Froome (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside postion to the stretch angled out for run, held place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Ike and Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered from the gate, rushed up to lead to stretch, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Writeitontheice
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered from gate lagged back to the turn, split horses for show

ENTRY.NAME: Official Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in start, regrouped to chase leader, angled out ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Kick Rocks Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip while never a threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WANNAGOCAMPING slow into stride from the gate, saved ground to the half, got through and cleared in the stretch stayed game to hold sway to the wire under stout handling. FLAT OUT FAY speed to the front, confronted into the turn while no match held place. CORTADO off rail trip, rallied into the stretch, denied place spot on wir. DOODLE DOO rail trip throughout while evenly with no late response. SLY WINK could not keep up while never a menace throughout. AMATTEROFPRINCIPLE off rail trip throughout with no response in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Wannagocamping
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the half, got through, cleared stretch, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Out Fay
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, confronted into the turn, no match held place

ENTRY.NAME: Cortado
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip, rallied into the stretch, denied place spot on wir

ENTRY.NAME: Doodle Doo
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail trip throughout while evenly with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Amatterofprinciple
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip throughout with no response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Sly Wink
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up while never a menace throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CELTIC MISCHIEF inside position to the turn, shuffled back, split horses stretch to be along in time under good handling to the wire. THIS ILL DEFEND trailed to the stretch, rallied outside with a late rush for place to just miss. NO COMMISSION unhurried to turn, rallied widest in the stretch late while weary in the final stages for show spot. ZAMFIR slow into stride from the gate, good position with no kick. SUGGESTED speed outside dueled between horses, to turn, gave in stretch. BOLD ADVENTURE never menaced throughout. LOCK ON dueled to turn, led into stretch, stayed to sixteenth pole, empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Zamfir
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride from the gate, good position with no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Celtic Mischief
ENTRY.OWNER: Hillyard Matthew and Hancock Donna G
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position to the turn, shuffled back, split horses in time

ENTRY.NAME: No Commission
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to turn, rallied widest in the stretch late, weary

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Adventure
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: This Ill Defend
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the stretch, rallied outside with a late rush

ENTRY.NAME: Suggested
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside dueled between horses, to turn, gave in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to turn, led into stretch, stayed to sixteenth pole, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 13, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT DAME nursed along nicely on the front end, stayed clear under stout handling to the wire as much the best. TALK RADIO chased winner throughout while no match in the stretch run and best of the rest. MEMPHIS CASH QUEEN between horses out of first turn shuffled back and rallied in the stretch to get up for show. ENDLESS raced along evenly while widest into first turn and, never a threat. SUM KINDA PRETTY inside run backstretch with no late response in tight stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Talk Radio
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout while no match, best of the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Memphis Cash Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses out of first turn shuffled back, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Kinda Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run backstretch with no late response, in tight stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Dame
ENTRY.COMMENT: nursed along nicely on front end, stayed clear, stout handling

ENTRY.NAME: Endless
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox Christopher J and Adams Janey
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly widest into first turn, never a threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $12,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACTUM'S STAR galloped along on the lead throughout, stayed well clear to the wire while well handled. GRAY DAY off rail run close up throughout, ran on in the stretch for place spot. PALACE TEMPTATION chased winner to far turn, could not go on and faded back. NEW YORK MIRACLE good position to far turn, went wrong and fell, unseating the rider while vanned off following the race

ENTRY.NAME: Factum's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: galloped along on the lead throughout, stayed well clear to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run close up throughout, ran on in stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: New York Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn, went wrong, fell and unseated rider

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to far turn, could not go on and faded back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registere d Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOT YET CHARLIE sent to the front, stayed well clear throughout, well handled. HARD LIGHTING unhurried early with no speed, ran on for quarter pole gained 2nd. TOMAHAWK KITTEN good position tracking winner throughout, settled for show spot. STUNNING BABY inside position throughout with no late kick from far turn. ZERO TO ONEHUNDRED lunged at the start and raced wide throughout and weakened from the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Stunning Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position throughout with no late kick from far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Tomahawk Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position tracking winner throughout, settled for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Not Yet Charlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to the front, stayed well clear throughout, well handled

ENTRY.NAME: Zero to Onehundred
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start while lunging with a wide trip fading back

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Lighting
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early with no speed, ran on for quarter pole gained 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPER BROTHER never far back to far turn, rallied outside steady gain, clear. FAST ROY speed to duel early, shook free into turn, no match for winner. PASION AZTECA dueled early on, stayed on game for show spot best of rest. TOP HAT BLITZ raced along evenly with no response when eed. COMBUSTION tried to keep to the half, failed to respond and faded back. MAYAN slow into stride and never factored.

ENTRY.NAME: Combustion
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep to the half, failed to respond and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Top Hat Blitz
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when eed

ENTRY.NAME: Mayan
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride and never factor

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back to far turn, rallied outside, steady gain, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to duel early, shook free into turn, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Pasion Azteca
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on, stayed on game for show spot best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1 1/16M Turf CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUSTICEOFTHEPEACE just off leaders, inside move to front far turn, cleared off in the final sixteenth under good handling to the wire. ROENICK no speed to far turn with a steady wide move for place spot. ICONICUS off rail run while never far back, inside stretch run for show. FLYING HOUDINI inside speed to the front, confronted at the half, weakened late. CANTSTOPTHEFUN tried to keep up for a half, weakened back from far turn. RIDGERUNNER raced along evenly with no response when needed. THE BIG NAUGHTY never menaced throughout. ALY STONE through early, dropped back readily. RED CHEEKS broke tardy from the gate while never prominent thereafter. ERASMUS tried to keep up for a half, gave in readily dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Houdini
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, confronted at the half, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Justiceofthepeace
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leaders, inside move to front far turn, cleared easily

ENTRY.NAME: Aly Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, dropped back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgerunner
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: The Big Naughty
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Roenick
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn with a steady wide move for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Erasmus
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for a half, gave in readily dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Red Cheeks
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy and never threatened there after

ENTRY.NAME: Iconicus
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run while never far back, inside stretch run for show

ENTRY.NAME: Cantstopthefun
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for a half, weakened back from far turn
